an4.15:1: "Bhikkhus, there are these four proclamations of the foremost. What four?
an4.15:2: R훮hu is the foremost of those with bodies,Mandh훮t훮, of those enjoying sense pleasures;M훮ra is the foremost of rulers,blazing with power and glory.
an4.15:3: In this world together with its devasabove, across, and below,as far as the world extends,the Buddha is declared foremost.
